content: comfortable and colorful this breezy shawl pattern is fun to crochet and easy to memorize designed using caron cotton funnel cakes shawl is worked side-to-side from the smallest point featuring double_crochet and chain stitch techniques wear it long or wrap it around to discover your best look customize size and color for yourself or to please a recipient this lighthearted layer of warmth is an easy-to-do gift idea that really impresses yarn for model caron® cotton funnel cakes™ 8 8 oz/250 g 425 yds/389 m rose petal 43030 2 balls
